item.title: Favourite films
item.author: Allysa Tan
item.description: my favourite films Inspired by my friend Marianna, here is a list of my favourite shows. gilmore girls never have i ever love, actually legally blonde I realised that listing my favourite films is a harder than excpected task. to be updated As you can see, I am a sucker for rom-coms. some criteria i use to rate shows include 1. how much it made me cry and 2. how fast the story goes.

item.title: First_post
item.author: Allysa Tan
item.description: Welcome to my first post Hello World!
